item.title: Integration User-Agent String Standard Proposal
item.description: The more integrations I write the more it becomes apparent that there is no consistency in User-Agent strings for the purposes of identification of whom is making what calls. It’s something that folks are supposed to do with making API calls, yet most folks don’t even bother with it. It creates nothing but issues when the people managing the application you’re talking to doesn’t inform the admins who you are or what you’re doing.
